org.apache.ignite.spi.loadbalancing.weightedrandom.WeightedRandomLoadBalancingSpi

  • Packages that use WeightedRandomLoadBalancingSpi 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.spi.loadbalancing.weightedrandom
    Contains weighted random-base implementation for load balancing SPI.

      Sets SPI name.

      Sets weight of this node.
      WeightedRandomLoadBalancingSpi WeightedRandomLoadBalancingSpi.setUseWeights(boolean isUseWeights)
      Sets a flag to indicate whether node weights should be checked when doing random load balancing.
